  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202751</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Analyzing Children's Letters to Mrs. Roosevelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analysieren der Zeichen der Kinder zur Mrs 
Roosevelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Analyse des lettres des enfants à Mme Roosevelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Analisando letras das crianças à Sra. Roosevelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Analizzare le lettere dei bambini alla sig.ra 
Roosevelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάλυση των επιστολών των παιδιών στην κα Roosevelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Analizar las cartas de los niños a señora 
Roosevelt</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will analyze letters that children wrote to Eleanor Roosevelt during the Great Depression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer analysieren Briefe, die Kinder 
Eleanor Roosevelt während des großen Tiefstands schrieben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants analyseront les lettres que les 
enfants ont écrites à Eleanor Roosevelt pendant la grande 
dépression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes analisarão as letras que as 
crianças escreveram a Eleanor Roosevelt durante o depression grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi analizzeranno le lettere che i bambini
hanno scritto a Eleanor Roosevelt durante la depressione grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αναλύσουν τις επιστολές που τα παιδιά
έγραψαν σε Eleanor Roosevelt κατά τη διάρκεια της μεγάλης 
οικονομικής κρίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes analizarán las letras que los 
niños escribieron a Eleanor Roosevelt durante la gran depresión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
